data.message: I have requested for 2 of my pages (that are identical) to be merged multiple times. I've followed all of the rules for merging, and it has been  2 weeks, and I haven't heard anything or had the merge requested. When can I expect to see these pages merged?

replies.message: Hey Hope. We appreciate your patience as our team reviews your Page merge request. In the meantime, you may be able to track the status of your request in your Support Inbox: http://bit.ly/2suBbhM. Hope this helps! -Stephanie
Facebook Yes, that's what I was hoping to do, but the request doesn't even show up in my support inbox.
Facebook Why did you respond to Hope `s question  and not to mine fb ???
They won't respond to me either, Ingrid Meerbeek-de Jager. I've had an ongoing problem since February. They don't care.
Facebook do you know what happened  to that account ? we can not login ,and i can not find anything in the help center that related to solve the problem .ok ?we need to talk face to face ?
not the password ! i even can not login the account ,how can i see the status ????????. ???

Facebook Thank you for your response. I didn't intend for my comment to generate so much feedback. I am unable to track my merge request in my support inbox. Should I be concerned that the request did not go through?
support inbox has stopped workkng.u have said u replied to my conceens, but it wont open constant loop..ive messeged u privately, but that stoped working now too!

Hi Facebook . I want to merge my pages but I got this messages.

"An error has occurred while merging Pages. This may have been caused by your attempt to merge too many Pages."

Is it there are solution for this problem ?
HEY FACEBOOK WHY DO I KEEP GETTING LOG IN ALL OVER THE USA I LIVE IN ONE STATE IS THIS SITE SECURE OR NOT AND WHY MUST I KEEP HAVING TO VERIFY MYSELF ???

Facebook  Call me   ya know the number im not getting calls and text from you at for my personal profile, only pw resets at email for personal profile ...https://www.facebook.com/TheUnitedStatesSurfingindian
Go to Help center  Facebook. Com.
